Paragraph.Text:
Rooms are spacious and deeply comfortable, and expansive spaces are ideal for events for up to 700 delegates or dinner dances and weddings for up to 500 guests. Complimentary wireless access is available throughout the hotel.
A buzzing Bijou Bar, destination restaurant Trunk, Annayu serves Indian cuisine and soothing Pegasus Spa make this hotel perfect for work or play. -Url: www.Radissonblu-edwardian.Com/heathrow . - Lhr-heathrow airport...............1.0 MI-1.6 KM - lgw-gatwick airport................32.0 MI-51.5 KM - downtown ..........................15.0 MI-24.1 KM . -Location description- located approximately 5 minutes by car from heathrow airport the radisson blu edwardian heathrow is the perfect choice for business or leisure travellers flying to and from the airport. For those with more time windsor castle and legoland are just 10 miles away whilst for sports fans royal ascot horse racing twickenham international rugby and the royal wentworth golf course are all within 20 miles of the luxury hotel. . -Property description- minutes from heathrow airport terminals 1 - 5. Spacious and modern rooms and suites. Expansive spaces for entertaining and large scale events. Includes the bijou bar for quiet drinks or celebratory cocktails. Stay park and fly package offers complimentary parking when you fly from heathrow. Complimentary wifi in all bedrooms and public areas. . . . Bathroom vanity in guest rooms for disabled person height

Public areas wheelchair accessible for disabled
High speed internet access for laptop in public areas
Hotel does not provide pornographic films/TV

Paragraph.Text: Coaches used to stop off on their way from Bath to London at Slough. And Premier Inn really is the perfect place to break the journey. Minutes away from the motorway network and Slough train station, you can zoom into London, or scoot around the sights nearby. Which royal residence would you like to visit? In under an hour you're in Paddington, with Buckingham Palace just up the road. But Windsor is even closer, and there's Legoland too. Wherever you're headed, return to your own palace here at Slough, with comfy beds and a Thyme restaurant too. Service Charge Of 5.63 GBP Per Booking No Extra Tax Extra adult 0.00 GBP Extra child 0.00 GBP rollaway for adult 0.00 GBP rollaway for child 0.00 GBP cot 0.00 GBP

BasicPropertyInfo.HotelAmenity: Wireless internet connection in public areas

Paragraph.Text: Jetting off or flying in? Wherever you're heading, you'll find Premier Inn Hotel Heathrow Bath Road a handy launch pad. And with great transport links and the Heathrow Express Rail just minutes away, you'll be well placed for business and leisure destinations throughout London too. If you've time to stop and explore, plan a big adventure at Legoland. Cheer on your team at Twickenham Stadium. Or head for high-adrenalin thrills and spills at Thorpe Park. Then come back to earth at our tasty restaurant, and unwind in your spacious room and extra-comfy bed.
